tool_description:
The IP2Proxy Proxy Detection Web Service allows instant detection of anonymous proxy by IP address. The IP2Proxy Proxy Detection Web Service enables you to check proxy servers for anonymity.

Sign up for free license key at http://www.fraudlabs.com/freelicense.aspx?PackageID=3 which allows up to 90 queries a month.
name: IP2Proxy
title: IP2Proxy

api_list.name: IP2Proxy API
